name: Break Into Zatwor
description:
BACK TO ZATWOR
Follow Randy Crow once again on his quest to save his brother from the very same prison he himself was imprisoned in.LARRY CROW

Help him use his previous experience to break the system and bring freedom to his beloved brother Larry who was put away into Zatwor for trying to help Randy grasp justice!STAY UNDETECTED

Be silent and stealthy, use the back door to walk undetected through the most brutal prison in the country!
